text: The 2005–06 Baylor Bears men's basketball team represented the Baylor University in the 2005–06 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The team's head coach was Scott Drew, who served in his third year. The team played its home games at the Ferrell Center in Waco, Texas as members of the Big 12 Conference.http://www.baylorbears.com/sports/m-baskbl/archive/bay-m-baskbl- sched-2005.html Baylor did not play its season opener until January 2006.
